search.title: Search
search.error: No result. Maybe instance is down ? Try to change Invidious instance from settings screen.
search.errorApi: Error. Maybe instance is down ? Try to change Invidious instance from settings screen.
search.emptyValue: You can't search with empty value

playlists.canNotReOrder: You cannot change order of a playlist by using an Invidious token.

player.errorLoadVideo: Error from Steam API. Loading next video

empty.favorisNotSet: Your favoris playlist is not set.

settings.title: Settings
settings.importExportText: Export or import my playlists and my favoris

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro1: This privacy policy governs your use of the software application
privacyPolicy.intro2: for mobile devices that was create by
privacyPolicy.dataText: Myself and the application do not collect any personal information whatsoever.
privacyPolicy.emailText1: If you contact me per email
privacyPolicy.emailText2: i will exclusively use your contact data to process your inquiry.
privacyPolicy.crashReportingText1: This app uses an self hosted Sentry instance crash reporting library, disabled by default
privacyPolicy.crashReportingText2: If the application crashes and you have activated crash reporting from the settings screen (and only if), Sentry collects data relating to the context : data relating to the application crash only.
privacyPolicy.permissionsTitle: Why HoloPlay request write external storage permissions ?
privacyPolicy.permissionsText1: HoloPlay will ask you for permission if you want to download music (to save it) as well as to generate a backup of your playlists from the settings screen.
privacyPolicy.permissionsText2: These are the two cases where HoloPlay will ask you for this permission. The files will be saved in the Document folder of your device.

addToPlaylist.title: Add to playlist
addToPlaylist.text: Select the playlist to which you want to add your music

editToken.title: Edit Invidious token
editToken.emptyToken: With an empty token, you will switch to logout mode

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.text: HoloPlay includes an error and performance monitoring tool that is disabled by default.
monitoring.text1: HoloPlay includes an error and performance monitoring tool that is disabled by default. No data is retrieved without your consent
monitoring.text2: By activating it, any errors will be sent to a self-hosted instance of Sentry
monitoring.label: Enable

snackbar.invidiousInstanceUpdated: Invidious instance and playlist are updated
snackbar.invidiousInstanceTokenUpdated: Invidious instance updated. Consider changing your token
snackbar.importData: Your playlist and your favoris has been imported
snackbar.dataExportSuccess: Your playlist and your favoris has been exported
snackbar.dataExportError: Error : your data can not been exported. Pleas check the app permission
snackbar.dataImportSuccess: Your playlist and your favoris has been imported
snackbar.dataImportError: Error : your data can not been imported. Pleas check the app permission
